meanings.definition: Honda: a Japanese automobile manufacturer known for producing reliable vehicles.
meanings.sent1: My friend drives a Honda to work every day.
meanings.sent2: The Honda dealership is having a sale on new cars.
meanings.sent3: Why did the Honda go to the mechanic? It needed an oil change!
meanings.sent4: The Honda fleet raced down the highway like a pack of loyal horses.
meanings.sent5: In the parking lot, the shiny Hondas stood out among the other cars.

meanings.definition: Honda: plural form of the word 'honda', referring to multiple vehicles manufactured by Honda.
meanings.sent1: The parking lot was filled with Hondas of all colors.
meanings.sent2: We saw a convoy of Hondas driving through the city.
meanings.sent3: The family decided to take two Hondas on their road trip for extra space.
meanings.sent4: The fleet of Hondas lined up like soldiers ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The Hondas parked in a row, gleaming under the sunlight.
